channel.title: Latest Mozilla Add-on Releases
channel.description: RSS feed of the latest add-on updates from Mozilla Add-ons (AMO)

item.title: JavanaGO v1.0
item.description: Just want to Share about JAVANAGO

item.title: Cyberpunk Muted v1.0
item.description: Started with an electric teal, an intense magenta and a lighter violet; but for readability and increased contrast the teal has been lightened to a near white, the magenta has been muted somewhat and the violet has been darkened to an almost black.

item.title: Zedokai Classic v1.0
item.description: A simple theme inspired by the Zed theme "Zedokai Classic." It feels classic and earthy.

item.title: Atelier Ecru v1.0
item.description: A minimalist theme inspired by fine stationery. Features a warm art paper background, clay accents, and deep ink black text. Reduces glare and offers high contrast for a cleaner, warmer reading experience.
